core:assignAction.core:comment: Default to page 1 to display most recent item

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: indexOf(transferOutApprovalItemsList, selectedRow) %listCriteria.pageInfo.rowCount==listCriteria.pageInfo.rowCount-1 || size(transferOutApprovalItemsList) == (indexOf(transferOutApprovalItemsList, selectedRow) + 1)? transferOutApprovalItemsList[indexOf(transferOutApprovalItemsList, selectedRow)]: transferOutApprovalItemsList[indexOf(transferOutApprovalItemsList, selectedRow) + 1]
